statements: SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE speed BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics WHERE speed > 10;
SELECT MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate, speed, distance_covered FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM performance_metrics WHERE speed > 10;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date, speed FROM training_sessions;
SELECT trainer_name, age FROM trainer;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM trainer;
SELECT heart_rate, distance_covered FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date = '2023-05-12';
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE heart_rate > 120 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT trainer_name, age, gender FROM trainer WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY trainer_name ASC;
SELECT session_id, speed, distance_covered FROM training_sessions WHERE speed >= 10 AND distance_covered < 5 ORDER BY session_id;
SELECT trainer_id, trainer_name FROM trainer WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY trainer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM heart_rate_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT session_id, distance FROM distance_metrics WHERE distance BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT session_id, speed FROM speed_metrics ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM heart_rate_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, speed FROM speed_metrics WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, distance FROM distance_metrics WHERE distance < 10 ORDER BY session_id, timestamp;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, speed FROM speed_metrics WHERE speed BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, distance FROM distance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND distance > 5 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT session_id, speed FROM speed_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT session_id, distance FROM distance_data ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT session_id, heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY session_id;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM speed_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE session_duration > 60 ORDER BY session_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, distance FROM distance_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT athlete_name, age, height FROM athletes WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT avg_speed, avg_heart_rate FROM training_sessions WHERE distance_covered > 10;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, age FROM athletes WHERE height < 180;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date, duration FROM training_sessions WHERE avg_heart_rate > 120;
SELECT AVG(avg_speed), MAX(avg_heart_rate) FROM training_sessions GROUP BY session_date;

SELECT athletes.athlete_name, training_sessions.session_date, heart_rate_data.heart_rate FROM athletes INNER JOIN training_sessions ON athletes.athlete_id = training_sessions.session_id INNER JOIN heart_rate_data ON training_sessions.session_id = heart_rate_data.session_id WHERE athletes.age > 25;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC, avg_speed ASC;
